Lena
quest.text: You agree to help. Find the Bandit Caves and kill Bandits. Pick up 10 Bandit Hoods.
Return to Lena with the Bandit Hoods.

quest.name: Bandit Quest
Lena
quest.text: As a reward, you get a Fairy Hat [@@770|@@]!

quest.name: Bandit Quest
Lena
quest.text: Now Lena asks you to kill the Bandit Lord.
You agree to do it. First, go through the Hermit's Cave and Lake Cave to find Bryant's Cave. There, Bryant will instruct you.

quest.name: Bandit Quest
Lena
quest.text: Next, search within the Lake Cave for a cave entrance with a red carpet outside. Go in to fight the Bandit Lord.

quest.name: Bandit Quest
Lena
quest.text: You slayed the Bandit Lord! Now return to Lena once more.

quest.name: Bandit Quest
Lena
quest.text: As a reward, you get the incredible Forest Armor [@@782|@@]!
You have finished the quest and Hurnscald is at peace again. Well done!
